attributes.action: Enact legislation which would stop local authorities charging supermarkets, department stores, etc for providing car parking space for their shoppers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Local Government Association wants its members to roll out a new local shopping tax which would charge for parking spaces provided by supermarkets, department stores and out-of-town malls.  This charge which would inevitably result in higher prices for consumers is yet another hidden tax on the british public and this government should put in place legislation which will stop this happening.
